product_name: Royal Robbins Myriad Shorts - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Royal Robbins Myriad shorts are ready to travel to your favorite warm-weather destination. Cotton and nylon blend offers the best of two worlds-it has the soft, comfortable feel of cotton with the durability and fast-drying properties of nylon. Hand pockets, discreet internal pockets and a zippered left thigh pocket keep your important travel items secure. Stash your cell phone in the drop-in pocket with snap closure on the back right thigh. 2 rear pockets (1 zippered and 1 rip-and-stick) provide additional storage. Gusseted crotch allows unrestricted range of motion. The Royal Robbins Myriad shorts have a regular fit. Closeout.
